description.value:
This silver signet ring changes to match the insignia of a lord or organization you serve (or your own face, if you serve no one else). It grants you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks and lets you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Message] as an arcane innate spell at will.

Activateâ€”Dispatch Messenger 1 minute (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The ring casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Messenger] to your specification. The animal is a magical creature that springs from the ring, and its appearance suits the iconography or heraldry of the lord or organization represented by the ring.
